introduction.name: Edgar Leung
introduction.title: Software Developer
introduction.summary: Hello, I'm Edgar Leung, a Full Stack Developer from Toronto focused on UI and back-end development. I build impactful web applications for diverse audiences, thriving in dynamic environments and delivering effective solutions.
introduction.More:
Beyond coding, I'm an avid adventurer; my hobbies include long-distance bicyclingâ€”having biked from Toronto to Niagara Falls over five times and completing a 1100km journey around Georgian Bay. I also enjoy long runs, hikes, and engaging in strategic games like Warhammer, which enrich my perspective and creativity 

 My journey into coding started during my high school days in robotics. Despite embarking on thrilling road adventures and exploring various opportunities, the persistent urge to code never left me. Now, I'm back in the world of coding, continuously learning and growing. I come from a Java background and am currently diving into Spring Boot to expand my full-stack development skills. Combining my experiences and expertise, I'm dedicated to creating innovative solutions that push boundaries.

workExperience.title: Web Developer

Collaborated effectively with technical and non-technical teams to design and implement new features with precision.

workExperience.description: Redesigned the merge queue tool for the Internet Archives to improve librarian accessibility and streamline author/work merges. Implemented Figma designs to enhance user interface efficiency and usability during remote collaboration.

workExperience.title: Web Developer Student

projects.name: Getogether
projects.description: Getogether is a dynamic application designed for creating and sharing events, drawing inspiration from the functionality of platforms like Meetup. The primary objective is to provide users with a seamless experience for organizing and discovering events in their community.
